value.title: DABUS: South Africa approved the world’s first AI-invented patent
value.excerpt: At first glance, a recently granted South African patent to DABUS, relating to a “food container based on fractal geometry” seems fairly mundane. On closer inspection, the patent is anything but mundane.

value.title: Samsung’s new robot vacuum uses LiDAR and AI to avoid obstacles, priced at RM4,999
value.excerpt: Samsung Malaysia just released its new robot vacuum, the Samsung Jet Bot AI+. It claims to be the first vacuum that uses AI and object recognition to navigate through your home. The Jet Bot AI+ uses a LiDAR sensor,

value.title: Is robot therapy the future?
value.excerpt: Seek help for a mental health issue today and you may find yourself referred to an online app or talking to a robot therapist. Is this welcome democratisation of an expensive resource – or the ‘Uberisation of therapy’?

value.title: John Deere acquires automated agritech start-up Bear Flag Robotics
value.excerpt: The $250m deal will see autonomous tractor company Bear Flag continue to operate from its Silicon Valley base.

value.title: A new generation of AI-powered robots is taking over warehouses
value.excerpt: Within a few years, any task that previously required hands to perform could be partially or fully automated away.

value.title: Dubai to Host Int'l Conference on Automation and Robotics in Construction
value.excerpt: For the first time in the Arab world, the United Arab Emirates will host the 38th International Symposium on Automation and Robotics in Construction

value.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI) Innovation Summit
value.excerpt: The Artificial Intelligence (AI) oracle and venture capitalist Dr Kai-Fu Lee predicted in 2018 that AI is going to change the world more than anything in the history of mankind. Even more than electricity.

value.title: Tesla teases future products using artificial intelligence not related to its electric vehicle fleet
value.excerpt: In the invite to its AI Day, Tesla is teasing the use of artificial intelligence beyond its electric vehicle fleet. What do you think they’re talking about? As we have reported over the last week, Tesla is preparing for its upcoming AI Day on August 19.

value.title: Tesla 25 Dojo AI Training Chips in a Module Seen Ahead of AI Day
value.excerpt: Ahead of Tesla AI day on August 19, 2021 is what looks like a 25 AI chip module for the Dojo Training supercomputer.

value.title: Mexican Artificial Intelligence startups with a global profile
value.excerpt: Kueski, Intellion, Kuona Analytics, Pro Indie Music, BrandMe, Homie, Bayonet, and SoldAI are transforming the way we work with Big Data.

value.title: Momentum builds in AI analytics platforms and robotics
value.excerpt: Funding in AI and robotics technologies is spiralling – covering everything from AI analytics platforms to autonomous sites and self-driving trucks

value.title: Artificial Intelligence and Automation to Lead Robotics Market Growth, says Beroe Inc
value.excerpt: Robotics has become a key strategy in the implementation of Industry 4.0. It helps save on labor costs, improve productivity, and increase

value.title: Meet Cassie, the first two-legged robot to set a running record using machine learning
value.excerpt: Cassie, a robot invented at Oregon State University in Corvallis, has set a record as the first two-legged robot to use machine learning to control its running gait on outdoor terrain, the university said.

value.title: Nvidia is tracking more than 8,500 AI startups with $60B in funding
value.excerpt: Nvidia is tracking more than 8,500 AI startups through its Inception AI startup program. Those companies have raised more than $60 billion.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence in Agriculture Market Size – Detailed Analysis of Current Industry Figures with Forecasts Growth By 2025
value.excerpt: Global Artificial Intelligence in Agriculture Market industry valued approximately USD 432.2 million in 2016 is anticipated to grow with a healthy growth rate of more than 22.5% over the forecast period 2017-2025.

value.title: Artificial Intelligence Wants You and Your Job
value.excerpt: The artificial intelligence (AI) behind the soothing voice telling us where to turn has replaced passenger-seat navigators, maps, even traffic updates on the radio. How on earth did we survive before this technology arrived in our lives?

value.title: Facebook open-sources Droidlet robotics development platform
value.excerpt: Facebook researchers wrote in a blog today that Droidlet ... but we believe that by sharing our research work with the AI community, all of us will get there faster.” You can read more about Droidlet here or check out the platform’s GitHub page.

value.title: SA first to award patent recognising artificial intelligence as inventor
value.excerpt: An artificial intelligence has invented a food container with a practical adaption for the transfer of heat into and out of the container.

value.title: Edtech Startup SP Robotic Works Raises $3 Mn From Mount Judi Growth Fund, Others
value.excerpt: SP Robotic Works has raised $3 Mn in Series A funding. With this round, the edtech startup has raised a total of $4 Mn in investment.

value.title: What the U.S. Can Learn From Europe’s Approach to Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Americans have good reason to be skeptical of artificial intelligence. Tesla crashes have dented the dream of self-driving cars. Mysterious algorithms predict job applicants’ performance based on little more than video interviews.

value.title: Human Assisted Artificial Intelligence: A Pathway to Trustworthy And Unbiased AI
value.excerpt: Using AI for automating manufacturing and improving our work streams, such as providing robust CMMS (computerized maintenance management systems) is an excellent application for AI.

value.title: Cansel Brings TinySurveyor Robot to Canada
value.excerpt: CNW/ - Cansel, a software, hardware, and service provider to engineering, surveying, construction, and utility industries, announced today an exclusive agreement with Denmark -based TinyMobileRobots to distribute the TinySurveyor robot in Canada.

value.title: AiM Medical Robotics Appoints Dr. Babak Kateb to Medical Advisory Board

value.title: Here Is A Fully Autonomous AI-Powered Beehive That Could Save Bee Colonies
value.excerpt: More than 30 percent of the world's honeybee colonies are vanishing each year. This company created the first fully autonomous beehive that can rescue and protect the bee colony 24/7.

value.title: Leveraging Simulators and Robotics to Enhance Operations in the Education Sector
value.excerpt: Technological advancements are enhancing various industries like travel healthcare, education, and communication. The use of simulation and robotic technologies are proving to be excellent factors of existing educational resources.

value.title: Cassie the bipedal robot uses machine learning to complete a 5km jog

value.title: Ambi Robotics releases Ambikit, a new kitting robot system
value.excerpt: Ambi Robotics introduces AmbiKit, a new AI-driven kitting applications that leverages vision and robots to pick items from bulk into kits.
